message.content: Figma is a popular online design and prototyping tool used by web, interface, and product designers to create high-fidelity mockups of their designs. The tool allows users to work collaboratively on projects in real time, making it ideal for teams working together on complex design tasks. Figma offers a range of features that make it easy for designers to create responsive designs, including support for various design file formats and the ability to preview designs across different devices and screen sizes. Additionally, Figma provides built-in collaboration tools like version control and live commenting, which can help teams stay organized and communicate more effectively as they work on projects together.
